meanings.definition: The rosy light of the setting or rising sun seen on high mountains.
meanings.sent1: As the sun dipped below the peaks, the alpenglow painted the mountains in a beautiful pink hue.
meanings.sent2: We hiked to the summit to witness the alpenglow on the snow-capped mountains.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel claimed the alpenglow was its secret power source.
meanings.sent4: The alpenglow draped the mountains like a warm blanket, soothing the tired hikers.
meanings.sent5: The alpenglow transformed the rocky landscape into a magical kingdom of light and color.

meanings.definition: A reddish glow seen near the horizon opposite the sun when it has set or is about to rise, caused by the reflection of sunlight by the atmosphere.
meanings.sent1: The alpenglow on the horizon signaled the end of a beautiful day.
meanings.sent2: The alpenglow bathed the sky in a warm, reddish light as the sun prepared to rise.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the alpenglow was a giant firefly playing tricks on the world.
meanings.sent4: The alpenglow danced on the clouds, creating a surreal painting in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The alpenglow enveloped the world in a soft, fiery embrace, promising a new day ahead.
